definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Ensure compliance to Crowne Plaza Keys mandatories and implementation of new standards.
sentences.chinese: 確保編輯皇冠假日主要條款並執行新標準。

sentences.english: There are two religion clauses in the First Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 《第一條修正案》裏有兩條關於宗教的條款。

sentences.english: Continuously track and monitor key contract clauses for risks and mitigations.
sentences.chinese: 對合同的特別條款進行有效跟蹤。

sentences.english: It also covers in detail state appellate decisions construing the policy provisions.
sentences.chinese: 還包括詳細的解釋政策條款的州上訴決議。

sentences.english: MFN clause generally applies to the substantive problem.
sentences.chinese: 最惠國待遇條款一般適用於實體問題。

sentences.english: All above offers are bound by relevant terms and conditions.
sentences.chinese: 以上所有優惠須受有關條款及細則約束。

sentences.english: The takings clause mediates between the police power and the eminent domain power.
sentences.chinese: 徵收條款是在警察權有償取得財產權的調和。

sentences.english: Do you have nay objection to the stipulations about the packing and shipping marks?
sentences.chinese: 有關包裝運輸嘜頭的條款你們有什幺異議嗎？

sentences.english: You can also specify addendum terms or documentation.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以指定附錄條款或文檔。

sentences.english: "He's not intending to invoke the clause, " Kutner told The Independent.
sentences.chinese: “他並不打算利用這個條款，”庫特納對獨立報說。

sentences.english: But any agreement must come with the right terms.
sentences.chinese: 但是任何協議必須要有合適的條款。

sentences.english: The terms under which China Sonangol buys oil from Angola have never been made public.
sentences.chinese: 中國和安中石油簽訂的石油採購條款從未被曝光。

sentences.english: Subject to certain conditions, quotas can be traded among boats.
sentences.chinese: 按照一些條款，配額可以在漁船之間交易。

sentences.english: Terms of the sale were not disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 此次收購的具體條款尚未公佈。

sentences.english: Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 合併協議的條款沒有披露。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
